metadata.description: Professional Agent Skills collection for AI-powered Platonic Coding workflows. Includes skills for project initialization, RFC specification management, implementation guides, code review, and end-to-end workflow orchestration, following the Agent Skills standard from agentskills.io

skills.name: platonic-init
skills.description: Initialize the Platonic Coding system for any project. Scaffolds specs infrastructure and scans existing codebases to recover missing design specs as Draft RFCs

skills.name: platonic-workflow
skills.description: Orchestrate the full Platonic Coding workflow from design draft to RFC, impl guide, code, and review. Always shows current phase; invokes platonic-specs, platonic-impl-guide, and platonic-code-review

skills.name: platonic-specs
skills.description: Manage and validate RFC-style specifications with dynamic generation of history, index, and namings files. For project initialization, use platonic-init instead

skills.name: platonic-impl-guide
skills.description: Create implementation guides that translate RFC specifications into concrete, project-specific technical designs. Language-aware and framework-aware

skills.name: platonic-code-review
skills.description: Review code implementation against specifications to ensure consistency and completeness. Validates spec-to-code alignment and generates compliance reports
